price: 4. Waxaan ugu sheegnay Ilmahii Israa'iil Kitaabka4 (Towraadda): Waxaad fasahaadin arlada labo jeer oo isku kibrin iskibrin weyn.
arabic: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَتُفۡسِدُنَّ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَّتَيۡنِ وَلَتَعۡلُنَّ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا
footnotes: 4. Horay ugu sheegnay waxyi ahaan Kitaabka Towraadda waxay falayaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqaḍaynā ilā banī is'rāīla fī al-kitābi latuf'sidunna fī al-arḍi marratayni walataʿlunna ʿuluwwan kabīran
